topics.body:
"@SidewardManatee":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5567744b6368727a8fca1a00#post_5567744b6368727a8fca1a00
I was trying to download some ROMs for the Dolphin Emulator I had installed yesterday.

And in the midst of doing so I ran into some funky programs that were giving me adds on my computer.

Luckily I deleted them. And everything _should_ be fixed now. 

My brother usually is the one that helps me with these things but He was asleep.

So I spent my entire night snooping around the web figuring out how to get rid of this problem. 

And even after finding a tutorial on how to delete it I ended up spending another few hours TRYING to understand what in the world they were telling me to do. 

And than after that spent another few hours making sure it was gone. And than my brother woke up and I spent another few hours talking to him about it.

And than came on here and was talking about it here.

*CHAOS*
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
So I just learned some interesting medical fact: apparently the back pain caused by large breasts is caused by them being too large versus how much muscle mass you have on you.

Essentially if you're a woman with large breasts: exercise to reduce back pain.

If you have no muscle mass on you to compensate for the weight you're gonna have a bad time.
